actions.text: Amendment SA 3362, under the order of 3/2/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 28.
Amendment SA 3362 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3378.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3362, under the order of 3/2/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 28.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To provide the Department of Justice with additional tools to target extraterritorial drug trafficking activity, and for other purposes.
